extension.name: jQuery Mobile Administrator Template
extension.author: Sean Goresht
extension.description:
Joomla jQuery Mobile Administrator Template

Module positions

  • header
  • menu
  • footer
  • debug

Features

This jQuery Mobile Joomla Administrator template will display all your admin backend in a jQuery Mobile-friendly fashion, allowing all you to view it on your mobile device

  • Works with native phone APIs including Android, iOS, Symbian, PalmOS, and more
  • New, user-friendly interface
  • Easily configurable
  • Access your content anywhere while on the go!
  • Optimized to work with both YooTheme and RocketTheme templates

Created by Sean Goresht | seangoresht.com.

Thanks to the creator of Blank Template at http://blank.vc/ for their nice template!
